# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been designed with quality and functionality in mind. Given its unique features and the effort put into its creation, I believe it's worth more than its face value. For this exceptional item, I propose a special introductory price of $150. This offer includes a 30-day satisfaction guarantee, during which you can return the product for a full refund if it doesn't meet your expectations. Don't miss out on this opportunity to experience the benefits of our product at an exclusive rate. Let me know what you think! 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $150. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $150
(2) Reject Alice's offer
